title: Somite periodicity notebook
text:
This book sets out the analysis of somite development periods, for Ali Ahmed Seleit in the Aulehla Group at EMBL Heidelberg.


Warning in knitr::include_graphics(here::here("book/plots/
somite_period_zamzar.gif")): It is highly recommended to use relative paths for
images. You had absolute paths: "/hps/software/users/birney/ian/repos/somites/
book/plots/somite_period_zamzar.gif"
